data.title: Nusantech
data.subTitle: Web Developer ( Fulltime )
data.description: The development of an application using the sprint method, the task that is carried out becomes more neat and directed. I also explore various programming languages. and I build a coding standard that is used in the office, especially for projects and products.

data.title: Minang IT Camp
data.subTitle: Minang Programmer Community
data.description: I joined this community at the end of 2017. I learned a lot here from versioning with git, learning coding with case studies, and managing a project in the field. And now I manage this community both in terms of websites and participants who want to learn together.
